inputs.name: secureFileId
inputs.label: Secure File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the secure file to download to a temporary location on the agent. The file will be cleaned up after the build or release.

inputs.name: rootFolder
inputs.label: Rootfolder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root folder that the signing pattern(s) will be run from.  Empty is the root of the repo.  Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: filePaths
inputs.label: Filepaths
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths to include as part of the signing. Supports multiple lines of match patterns. [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=708389)

inputs.name: timeServer
inputs.label: Timestamp Server Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute Url of the timestamp server to use.

inputs.name: hashingAlgorithm
inputs.label: Hashing Algorithm
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file digest algorithm to use for creating file signatures (i.e. SHA256 or SHA1).
